ExternalData.Titlesect: Agreement governing the Activities of States on the Moon and Other Celestial Bodies

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations, Treaty Series , vol. 1363, p. 3; and depositary notification C.N.107.1981.TREATIES-2 of 27 May 1981 [procès-verbal of rectification of the English authentic text of article 5 (1)].

TreatyNote.Text: The Agreement was adopted by resolution 34/681of the General Assembly of the United Nations dated 5 December 1979. It was opened for signature on 18 December 1979.
